name: react-frec
description: This is a type library to simplify "React.forwardRef" and "React.ForwardRefExoticComponent"

scripts.versionup:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major
scripts.versionup:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor
scripts.versionup:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch

author: misuken
